items.sentence: Before deciding, I'd like to consult with my family.
He stole out of the house without anyone seeing him.
He pinched and scraped for many years to save money.
He caught my hand and pulled me to the second floor.
He was deep in debt, and had to part with his house.
He is said to have been very poor when he was young.
Tom has been teaching Mary French for several years.
Tom must've been very young when he wrote that song.
Someone broke into our house while we were sleeping.
When I got home, my mother and father were fighting.
